homepage.pageSubtitle: offers a simple and secure way to invest in the world of cryptocurrencies.
homepage.featuresTitle: A platform to track your earnings in real time

features.firstFeatureSubtitle: Find the detail of your movements and follow in real time the evolution of your earnings.
features.secondFeatureSubtitle: Deposit and withdraw easily and securely with multiple networks and cryptocurrencies available.
features.thirdFeatureSubtitle: Reactive support to accompany you during your investment.

homepage.benefitsSubtitle: is based on these three fundamental values which are essential for its proper functioning

benefits.firstBenefitSubtitle1: and its platform are 100% regulated by the validators who issue the licences allowing
benefits.secondBenefitSubtitle: Unparalleled profitability through high frequency trading in exclusives financial markets.
benefits.thirdBenefitSubtitle: You are free to deposit and withdraw in cryptocurrencies. Withdrawal is possible from 2 weeks after your first deposit.

homepage.secondQuestion: What are the deposit and withdrawal limits ?
homepage.secondQuestionAnswer: Deposits and withdrawals have no limit but must be at least $1000
homepage.fourthQuestionAnswer1: has been operating since 2004 in its market. Then it opened up to the ETF, cryptocurrency and commodity markets. Since very recently
homepage.fourthQuestionAnswer2: has been regulated/in the process of being regulated.
